Sentencas: The reversible operated high temperature solid oxide cell system (rSOC-System) seems to be a promising technology, enabling our future energy system to cope with the challenges of the transition to renewable electricity production and electrification.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: The rSOC-System provides energy storage capabilities and connects different energy carriers.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: This work provides insights into the coupling possibilities of such a system to industrial processes.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: Based on previously published investigations a flowsheet for the rSOC-System is chosen and described.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: To enable a quantitative analysis of the interaction with industries, a simulation model for this rSOC-System is created.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: This model is used for creating energy conversion and efficiency maps, which are then discuss with respect to the system behaviour.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: The increase of the system's conversion efficiency is determined for a selection of thermal coupling and operation scenarios.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes

Sentencas: This work concludes with an analysis of the scenario dependent effect of heat coupling and the consequences for the integration of a rSOC-System to industrial processes.
Titulo: Integration of a rSOC-system to industrial processes
